summary: This is an email from the U.S. Department of Justice's voicemail system forwarding a voice message to the USANYS-EpsteinVictims email address on July 29, 2019. The email contains an attached .wav audio file of the voice message.

events.title: Voice Message Forwarded to Epstein Victims Email
events.description: A voice message was forwarded via email to the USANYS-EpsteinVictims address from the DOJ's voicemail system.

keyFacts: The U.S. Department of Justice maintained a dedicated email address (USANYS.EpsteinVictims@usa.doj.gov) for Epstein victims.
A voice message was forwarded to this victims' email address on July 29, 2019.
The message originated from the DOJ's voicemail system (voip.usa.doj.gov).
The email contained an attached .wav audio file of the voice message.
This document shows official DOJ communication channels for victim contact in July 2019.
